explains: n. 派系；阀；私党；小圈子

sentences.en: Kids need a range of authentic role models—as opposed to members of their clique, pop stars and vaunted athletes.
sentences.cn: 孩子们需要一些真正的榜样，而不是他们小圈子里的人、流行歌星或自吹自擂的运动员那样的。

sentences.en: He was accepted into the most popular clique on campus.
sentences.cn: 他被吸收到了校园里最受欢迎的小团体里。

sentences.en: It might, at last, silence the small but noisy intellectual clique.
sentences.cn: 它或许最终能让那个人数不多却哗众取宠的知识分子群体安静下来。
